verses.text: And when \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w* the \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* of \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that her \w son|strong="H1121"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, she \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* and \w destroyed|strong="H0006"\w* all the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w royal|strong="H4467"\w*.\f + \fr 11.1 \ft seed…: Heb. seed of the kingdom\f*

But \w Jehosheba|strong="H3089"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w*, \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* of \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w*, \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w*, and \w stole|strong="H1589"\w* him from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \add which were\add* \w slain|strong="H4191"\w*; and they \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* him, \add even\add* him and his \w nurse|strong="H3243"\w*, in the \w bedchamber|strong="H2315"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w*, so that he was not \w slain|strong="H4191"\w*.\f + \fr 11.2 \ft Jehosheba: also called, Jehoshabeath\f*\f + \fr 11.2 \ft Joash: also called, Jehoash\f*

And he was with her \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*. And \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w* did \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ And the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* and \w fetched|strong="H3947"\w* the \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* over \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, with the \w captains|strong="H3746"\w* and the \w guard|strong="H7323"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them to him into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with them, and took an \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* of them in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* them the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

And he \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* that ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w*; A third \w part|strong="H7992"\w* of you that enter \w in|strong="H0935"\w* on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* shall even be \w keepers|strong="H8104"\w* of the \w watch|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*;

And a third \w part|strong="H7992"\w* \add shall be\add* at the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Sur|strong="H5495"\w*; and a third \w part|strong="H7992"\w* at the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* the \w guard|strong="H7323"\w*: so shall ye \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w watch|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, that it be not broken \w down|strong="H4535"\w*.\f + \fr 11.6 \ft that…: or, from breaking up\f*

And \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w parts|strong="H3027"\w* of all you that go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, even they shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w watch|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w about|strong="H0413"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 11.7 \ft parts: or, companies: Heb. hands\f*

And ye shall \w compass|strong="H5362"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* with his \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: and he that \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* within the \w ranges|strong="H7713"\w*, let him be \w slain|strong="H4191"\w*: and be ye with the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* as he goeth \w out|strong="H3318"\w* and as he cometh \w in|strong="H0935"\w*.

And the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* over the \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according to all \add things\add* that \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*: and they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that were to come \w in|strong="H0935"\w* on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, with them that should go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.

And to the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* over \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w* did the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w spears|strong="H2595"\w* and \w shields|strong="H7982"\w*, that \add were\add* in the \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And the \w guard|strong="H7323"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* with his \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, from the \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w corner|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* to the \w left|strong="H8042"\w* \w corner|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*, \add along\add* by the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* and the \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 11.11 \ft corner: Heb. shoulder\f*

And he brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w crown|strong="H5145"\w* upon him, and \add gave him\add* the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*; and they made him \w king|strong="H4427"\w*, and \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* him; and they \w clapped|strong="H5221"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, God \w save|strong="H2421"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 11.12 \ft God…: Heb. Let the king live\f*

¶ And when \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w guard|strong="H7323"\w* \add and\add* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, she \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* into the \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And when she \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, behold, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* by a \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w*, as the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w* \add was\add*, and the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* and the \w trumpeters|strong="H2689"\w* by the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8056"\w*, and \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* with \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*: and \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w* \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* her \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w cried|strong="H7121"\w*, \w Treason|strong="H7195"\w*, \w Treason|strong="H7195"\w*.

But \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, the \w officers|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w host|strong="H2428"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Have her \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w without|strong="H1004"\w* the \w ranges|strong="H7713"\w*: and him that \w followeth|strong="H0935"\w* her \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*. For the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* had \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let her not be \w slain|strong="H4191"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And they \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* on her; and she \w went|strong="H0935"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* by the which the \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w came|strong="H3996"\w* into the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: and there was she \w slain|strong="H4191"\w*.

¶ And \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* between the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that they should be the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; between the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* also and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, and brake it \w down|strong="H5422"\w*; his \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* and his \w images|strong="H6754"\w* brake they in \w pieces|strong="H7665"\w* \w thoroughly|strong="H3190"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* \w Mattan|strong="H4977"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*. And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w appointed|strong="H7760"\w* \w officers|strong="H6485"\w* over the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 11.18 \ft officers: Heb. offices\f*

And he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* over \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, and the \w captains|strong="H3746"\w*, and the \w guard|strong="H7323"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; and they brought \w down|strong="H3381"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w guard|strong="H7323"\w* to the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. And he \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* on the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*.

And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w*, and the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* was in \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w*: and they \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \add beside\add* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.
\w Seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \add was\add* \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*.
